name: Nonyelum Stella Iwuchukwu
summary: Highly motivated Software/Support Specialist with years of experience in systems, software, and technical support. Seeking opportunities in IT support, Cloud, and AI.

experience.title: Technical Support Specialist
responsibilities: Provided on-call support to end-users, resolving technical issues and reducing ticket volume.
Assisted customers and call agents with technical issues, reducing customer support calls.
Troubleshot and resolved customers' technical issues promptly, improving task handling time.
Resolved firmware and MFA issues, ensuring customer access to accounts and device management.
Contributed to knowledge base and online technical documentation, improving customer success stories and reducing inbound calls.
Installed and configured hardware and software, providing guides for product usage.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer Intern
responsibilities: Contributed to the development and maintenance of tools and solutions related to deployment and the DevOps platform.
Managed and monitored environment reservation systems, adhering to best practices.
Monitored application and infrastructure stability and reliability, identifying issues early and collaborating for resolutions.
Expanded skills and knowledge through online training in provisioning and configuration of virtual servers and other relevant technologies.

experience.title: IT Trainer
responsibilities: Collaborated to develop a curriculum covering basic to intermediate web development.
Led trainees in building full-stack applications and successful deployment.
Managed and mentored non-technical trainees in web development using agile methodologies.
Led a team of trainees to successfully complete a major IT project.
Assisted in IT and technical activities, providing reliable technical backup for trainees.

achievements.description: Trained over 200 Girls and Ladies on Web Development.
Transformed the lives of young women into productive and resourceful individuals in STEM and Tech related roles/activities.

strengths.description: Ability to provide swift and positive solutions to clients, strong communication skills, both verbal and written, with the ability to demonstrate empathy, compassion, patience, and professionalism.

Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to address complex technical challenges faced by customers. This includes the ability to systematically diagnose issues, research solutions, and implement effective troubleshooting steps.
